entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,870Chapters: 21/21Kudos: 634

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.

entry.title: Glass Homes
entry.summary:
Author: Imsbdl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,021Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: A kid goes missing and suddenly your drowning in memorys of the broken streets that raised you. It is a reacurring story, swept under files at GCPD never to see the light of day. Never to reunite weeping mothers and kids toghther, the malice in this city girps at the children so fast. Throwing them into a world they have no place in. Crime Alley. It cant happen again...You dont know how little you matter until your all alone. Gripped by a powerfull men as the world around you crumbles. It can't happen again.Even if your life becomes languidly intertwined with a vigilante, on quite nights and open windowsills. It wont happen again.

entry.title: The Way You See Me
entry.summary:
Author: Xivkyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,301Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 14

Summary: After being an experiment to Hugo Strange for the majority of your life you finally escape. The trauma of your time there follows you as you remember the screams and death all around you. You don't even know your own name as the number 'Seven' was the only semblance of a name you were given. You have no one to go home to and nothing you look forward to except for revenge. It consumes your every thought ever since you escaped. You want him to feel the pain he caused you and your friends.Limited y/n usage

entry.title: The Theory of Liminal Happiness
entry.summary:
Author: i88

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,592Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 86

Summary: Jason Todd has the worst and best luck of anyone he knows. He got caught stealing Batman's tires, but then he was adopted by Bruce Wayne. Then Robin, but then Joker. Dead. Resurrected. Replaced. Red Hood. Redemption. On and on with his fucking luck until in the most ridiculous of twists he is the only person on earth who can help a young witch regain her powers after her literal demon of an ex-boyfriend stole them. All she needs from Jason is his hair, his blood, and his virginity. At least she doesn't need him to die again.

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,212Chapters: 10/25Kudos: 120

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,646Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 73

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn’t even last a second, but that’s all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it’ll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn’t see it.He doesn’t feel it. A.K.A The reader’s soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she’s not his and she’s torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,086Chapters: 31/31Kudos: 968

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n
